name: Ipomoea
description:
MADE FOR IGMC 2022

Ipomoea is a short lineal Turn Based RPG about a girl who wakes up only to take care of the dead flowers that appear in her garden and bring them back to life.  How long has she been doing this?

Graphics:

Angel Cervantes

Karen Garavito

Programming:

Cachi Córdova

Artbook:
